{{velocity}} ## You can modify this page to customize the presentation of your object. ## At first you should keep the default presentation and just save the document.
## Get the css and js for the map #set ($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use('Map.Code.Leaflet')) #set ($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use('Map.Code.Leaflet')) #set ($mapId = $util.generateRandomString(5)) #set ($currentDoc = $doc.getDocumentReference())
## If editing, then display editing options #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') #set ($class = $doc.getObject('Map.Code.SimpleMap.SimpleMapClass').xWikiClass) #foreach ($prop in $class.properties) ; $prop.prettyName ; $doc.display($prop.getName()) #end #elseif ($currentDoc == 'xwiki:Map.Code.SimpleMap.SimpleMapSheet' || $currentDoc == 'xwiki:Map.Code.SimpleMap.SimpleMapTemplate') ## Do nothing #else ## Create the map #set ($class = $doc.getObject('Map.Code.SimpleMap.SimpleMapClass')) #set ($markerLoc = $class.getValue('markerLocation')) #set ($popupData = $class.getValue('popupData'))
## Convert popupData to html #set ($xdom = $services.rendering.parse($popupData, "xwiki/2.1")) #set ($popupData = $services.rendering.render($xdom, "xhtml/1.0"))
(% class="map-container" id="map-${mapId}" style="width: 100%; height: 400px;" data-location="${markerLoc}" data-popup='${popupData}' %)((())) #end
{{/velocity}}
